name: Baked Salmon
ingredients: 1 pound salmon or other fish fillet, thawed if frozen

instructions.en: Place the fish in a greased baking dish. Optionally, line with heavy foil for easy clean up.
Sprinkle the fish with garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Dot with soft butter and spread over the surface of fish.
Bake at 425Â°F for 6-12 minutes, or until the thickest part of the salmon is just done. Check frequently to prevent over-cooking.
Optional: Put the fish under the broiler for a few minutes to brown the top.

notes: Baking time will depend on the thickness of the fish, so start with the minimum time and check frequently to prevent over-cooking. This recipe can be frozen for later use.
